sentences.sContent: Second, the mission of the United Nations requires liberating people from hunger and disease.
sentences.sContent_eng: Second, the mission of the United Nations requires liberating people from hunger and disease.
sentences.sCn: 其次，联合国的使命要求把人们从饥饿和疾病中解放出来。

sentences.sContent: Finally, the mission of the United Nations requires liberating people from poverty and despair.
sentences.sContent_eng: Finally, the mission of the United Nations requires liberating people from poverty and despair.
sentences.sCn: 最后，联合国的使命要求把人民从贫困与绝望中解放出来。

sentences.sContent: First, the mission of the United Nations requires liberating people from tyranny and violence.
sentences.sContent_eng: First, the mission of the United Nations requires liberating people from tyranny and violence.
sentences.sCn: 首先，联合国的使命要求把人们从暴政和暴力下解放出来。
